roleset.name: make unimportant
roleset.note: MARGINALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'marginalize' based on wsj; nominal 'marginalization' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls remedy-45.7. (from marginalize.01-v)
MARGINALIZATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from marginalization.01-n)

example.name: marginalize-v: the one example
example.text: The most important development in [Mr. Gorbachev]-1's policy for *trace*-1 marginalizing the opposition movement is the claim that the U.S.S.R. also suffers from terrorism.

example.name: marginalization-n
example.text: No parents want to see their own children grow up under pressure and anxiety , but , in order to avoid marginalization by the assessment system , they have to , very reluctantly , send their own kids to various auxiliary classes and accompany their kids to stay up reciting textbooks and doing homework by themselves .

roleset.name: in the margin, almost not making a cut-off
roleset.note: MARGINAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8, comparison to low.01. Semi-relation to marginalize.01. (from marginal.01-j)

example.name: marginal-j: arg3
example.text: non-Annex B participation in emissions reduction is marginal, at 7 per cent of the total carbon mitigation.
example.arg: non-Annex B participation in emissions reduction
at 7 per cent of the total carbon mitigation

example.name: marginal-j: arg1
example.text: BP has been marginal over night , but did not require pressors .

roleset.name: hardly skilled at
roleset.note: MARGINAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia .Comparison to good.02 (from marginal.02-j)

example.name: marginal-j: both args
example.text: I-1 like playing chess and while would only profess *PRO*-1 to be marginal at playing it, I'm always willing to improve... and move my pieces differently.
